Name: Entente Cordiale Cocktail
Ingredients: 20 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This gin laced cocktail is flavoured with apricot liqueur which is balanced and made more complex by dry vermouth. A dash of orange bitters and a light lemon zest twist subtly serve to unify all. (Go easy with the bitters and zest.)
Nutrition: One serving of Entente Cordiale Cocktail contains 161 calories
